extendedInfo.description: Mine One Too... is span of a year of an authorâs life. A man, Diwakar Joshi, after losing his job in a media company because of his senseless articles, goes for novel writing to become a famous and rich personality. But in his endeavor to search of believable fiction, he meets unbelievable truth. His journey of a soul-transforming year of his life travels through some of the worst incidents including death of his dear ones and being charged for murder of them.     A novel that is based on a very serious social issue âHuman Organ Traffickingâ is itâs kind of first novel. It is written in simple language to attach youth and turns around Mumbai, Ahmedabad, Delhi and Jaipur. The strongest part of the novel is the pace that never decelerates during its 31 chapters. An awakening call for unaware Indians, in its best of fiction way, is Mine One Too...

reviews.title: Must download
reviews.comment: Finished 1st chp just after downloading, very interesting to read. Kudos to application designers as well, very neat & reader oriented user interface.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: By youth for youth...
reviews.comment: An interesting novel with twist & turns...reached half way mark...take a bow author...

reviews.title: Jems
reviews.comment: Just started reading it. And it is really good to have such simple yet interesting book. Worth installing. I\'ll recomend to you too for downloading & reading.

reviews.title: Amazing. G
reviews.comment: Amazing journey.. :)... Started reading it today.. & completed almost half the novel continuously.. Very good effort by the author with content.. Down to Earth feeling.. :) cheers..

reviews.comment: One of the best fiction I have ever read.

reviews.title: Great fun with content
reviews.comment: Just loved the concept as well as narration. Simply superb story with all formula film masala within. Highly recommended for readers and non readers too...
reviews.author: Kalpesh Vyas
